title: Three cheese pizza with a rocket and parmesan salad
description: Italian cheeses are the star of this vegetarian pizza recipe. The recipe makes between six and eight pizzas, depending on how large you make them.
ingredients: 200g/7oz semolina flour, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz pecorino cheese (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
75g/2½oz parmesan cheese, shaved (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese)
